title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #79
body:
## Date and Time

Mar 01, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/)â€Š
   - KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm and Ethereum dev
     - [Chaos Engineering of Ethereum Clients](https://etherworld.co/2022/02/21/chaos-engineering-of-ethereum-clients/)
   - [Kurtosis testing](https://youtu.be/yMe4RG5emx8)
- [Shanghai EIPs](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues)

### 2. Events & hackathon
- [ETHernals](https://ethernals.devfolio.co/) February 25 - March 27, 2022
- [ETHWMN Fellowship](https://ethwmn.devfolio.co/) February 7 - April 3, 2022
- The Future of Inclusion 3.0 - March 08, 2022 at noon EST
- EEA Education Series Webinar - March 16, 2022
- [Ethereum Rio](https://www.ethereum.rio/) - 11-16 March 2022
- [Devconnect](https://devconnect.org/) Amsterdam, Netherlands April 2022

### 3. New initiatives & open tasks
- [Cat Weekly Comic](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/CatWeeklyComic)
- ECH website hosting via Github page
- Client meetings in podcast form
- [EL Merge Client Release Naming](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/el-merge-client-release-naming/7928/14)

### 4. ECH updates
- ECH website
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - EIP bot
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- Cat blazers 
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
   - ECH Medium to Mirror 
   - ECH ENS names Ref: [Comment](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/268#issuecomment-1039942553)
- ECH Operations 
   - ECH New Joiners Meeting March 2022
   - Women's day celebration
- [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
   - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 

  - All Core Dev meeting [notes 132](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/488)
  - Consensus meeting notes 82
  - EIP Improvement Process [meeting 50](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/blob/master/All%20EIPIP%20Meetings/Meeting%20050.md)
  - EIP editors apprentice meetings 13 - [Recording](https://youtu.be/zAo0xMosrMQ), 


### 5. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 6. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 78](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20078.md)

 Anything else?
#### The date for the next meeting - March 15, 2022.
